Education

college drop out. trained in the real world.

A few thoughts on education. We should never stop learning, exploring, building and challenging ourselves to contribute to society. We shouldn't let conventional be our compass either. We should embrace the creativity, the failure, the passion that comes with growth. College at its core is meant to yield the user the tools and education needed to be proficient when cast into the real world.

I was unconventional. I embraced technology and followed masters all over the world. I learned early while in college my love for Graphic Design. I surpassed the students in my class,Â realizing many of the methods to be outdated in contrast to those experts I followed. It was then that I realized that College wasn't about the end destination, but about one's journey and finding life long passion along the way.

Frequently Asked Questions

What services do you offer?

My services land in to 4 primary categories:

  1. Promotion - a combined set of marketing materials to help you reach your audience.
  2. New Business - business assets such as new websites, eCommerce stores, logos, business cards, etc to help you get off the ground running.
  3. eCommerce / Redesign - If you need a website that does it all: completely custom, ability to edit everything and training videos to get you going, then you've come to the right place.
  4. Hire me / Retainers - Need extra help or a custom build? I offerÂ Design, Web, Store maintenance, eCommerce, Photography, Logo design, a Time Machine. I can deliver.Â Available early AM, late PM.Â I speak Line, color, texture, contrast, alignment, shape, size, value, space, repetition, proximity, eCommerce, WordPress, X, Cornerstone, Drupal, Magento, Joomla, UX, HTML5, CSS3, LESS, SASS, PHP, MySQL, JS, JQUERY,Git
How do I cancel my membership?

Canceling is super simple. And should be.

Note that canceling your subscription stops your next promotion, not the current one being currently worked on.

If you order on August 25, 2017 for your first promotion (A).

And cancel on September 15, 2017.

Promotion (B) that's due to start on September 25, 2017 will be canceled, not Promotion (A) purchased on August 25, 2017.

Consider downgrading your promotion package here before canceling.

Be sure to cancel 3 days before your next renewal date to ensure your card isn't drafted for the next promotion.

  1. Just go to Account page.
  2. ClickÂ Subscriptions
  3. View the subscription you'd like to cancel
  4. PressÂ Cancel button.
  5. You're all done.

You can always restart your subscription here.

Will my card be charged immediately if I upgrade or downgrade my subscription?

The simple answer: No.

Let's say you purchase Promo Delight on August 25, 2017 for $499 + tax.

You decide that you want to upgrade toÂ Promo Ignite ($999Â  + tax)Â on September 7, 2017.

Your card will not be charged $999Â + tax forÂ Promo Ignite until your next renewal date,Â September 25, 2017.

Â

What is your specialty?

Try out a Start Right Promo to see what I mean. :)

Do you offer printing services?

Absolutely. Just pick what you need here, and email any FINAL assets matching design specs to will@startrighttoday.com

Why does it make sense to purchase a promotion vs individual products?

The best way to save with Start Right and get best ROI is batching specific deliverable designs. If you're running a promotion on say, "Cheese Cake," if you order flyers, banners and posters separate, you'll end up paying for a design fee for each deliverable.

With Start Right Promo, you pay for a primary or primary and secondary design fee and all of this carries down to all of your deliverables. Ultimately saving you a ton of money.
